channel.title: toolong on Matt Carrier
channel.description: Recent content in toolong on Matt Carrier

item.title: Packaging python app with poetry2nix using nix flakes
item.description: Background I have some backup logs that have failures I wanted to search and recently came across toolong but it is not currently in nixpkgs. I figured this is a good chance to try out poetry2nix I keep reading about and went through the process of packaging this so I could use it easily with nix.
